snippet: The Israeli military said the strike, which killed the secretary general of the Popular Resistance Committees, was meant to thwart a terrorist attack the group was planning.
abstract: Israeli airstrikes kill up to 10 Palestinians in Gaza Strip, including a militant leader; Israeli military says strike was meant to thwart a terrorist attack that Hamas was planning.

byline.original: By FARES AKRAM and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Fares Akram reported from Gaza, and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: The Israeli military said the strike, which killed the secretary general of the Popular Resistance Committees, was meant to thwart a terrorist attack the group was planning.

headline.seo: Israeli Airstrikes Kill Militants in Gaza
headline.main: Israeli Airstrikes Kill Militants in Gaza
headline.print_headline: Gaza: Airstrikes Kill 10, Including a Militant Leader
